title: Design for Knotted Pile Bedspread
medium: Crayon and graphite on heavy tracing paper
description: Perspective view, from the right side, of bed with headboard, night table, and curtain indicated lightly.  Bedspread shown in yellow, orange, turquoise, blue stripes down the middle and flaring over the pillow area.
name: Drawing
